title: #95: Capitol Nonsense & The New Normal | Chrissie Mayr
description:
Comedian Chrissie Mayr of the Chrissie Mayr Podcast joins up with Macroaggressions for a Swapcast to discuss the insanity of 2020, the Capitol Hill fake insurrection, and Dunkin Donuts.

Sometimes the best way to deal with the craziness of life is to have a laugh and embrace the ridiculous, and Chrissie certainly knows how to do that after a career as a stand-up comedian. Whether it is the calls to just “trust the science”, “trust the plan”, or “trust all women”, what has become crystal clear is that most people are having a hard time trusting anything, and with good reason.
